body.name: Nature Made Chewable Vitamin C 500 mg Tablets, 150 Count Value Size to Help Support the Immune System
features: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains a 150-day supply of Nature Made Chewable Vitamin C 500 mg Tablets, 150 tablets per bottle.
Helps support the immune system. Antioxidant support.
Adults, chew 1 tablet daily with a meal.
Guaranteed to meet our high quality standards. Made from carefully selected ingredients under strict manufacturing processes. No color added, no artificial flavors.
body.description: Dietary Supplement. USP verified. Helps support the immune system. Antioxidant - helps support the immune system. Easy and great tasting source of vitamin C which also helps neutralize free radicals and helps improve iron absorption by the body. No artificial colors. No artificial flavors. No preservatives. No yeast. USP has tested and verified ingredients, potency and manufacturing process.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #174,704 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #976 in Vitamin C Supplements

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DELICIOUS DAILY IMMUNE SUPPORT† Back in original orange flavor, at your request! Vitamin C is an essential nutrient and antioxidant that supports the immune system, and helps neutralize free radicals in the body. This chewable Vitamin C is an easy and tasty way to get the immune support you need, every day.† 100% DAILY VALUE OF VITAMIN C** Each serving contains 500mg of Vitamin C, meeting 100% of the daily needs for healthy adults ages 19+.** **The Vitamin C recommended dietary allowance (RDA) for healthy women and men 19 years and older is 75mg and 90mg respectively. SUPPORTS COLLAGEN SYNTHESIS† Vitamin C also aids in Iron absorption, and is necessary for the body to produce Collagen, which helps support healthy skin.† HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS Guaranteed to meet out high quality standards. Made from carefully selected ingredients under strict manufacturing processes. No color added, no artificial flavors.

Understanding Vitamin C Vitamin C (or ascorbic acid, for trivia night) is an essential nutrient that supports your immune system and that your body needs to consume and replenish every day. Vitamin C is not only an antioxidant that helps support your immune system, but it also increases iron absorption from food and is needed for collagen synthesis to support overall skin health.† Vitamin C is found in many fruits and vegetables, but according to a study conducted by the National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey in 2020 almost 1/2 of U.S. adults are not getting enough Vitamin C through their daily food intake. If you just want to make sure you're getting what your body needs, Vitamin C supplements can help. Vitamin C plays an important role in supporting the immune system. As an antioxidant, it helps neutralize free radicals in the body. And it may help aid in iron absorption in the body too. Vitamin C intake can help support a healthy immune system.†

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to chew
reviews.reviewText: My family takes Vitamins daily. I was advised to start Vitamin C and know of the brand from current usage. I like that you can chew these and the flavor is pleasant. They are a tad large due to the dosage but you can always break them in half first. They are affordable and of a high quality. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product, Mahalo
reviews.reviewText: I have taken these for many years. I have tried other brands but always come back to this one. They taste like sweet n sour citrus and they work wonders on allergy conditions. Chew slowly occasionally putting some under your tongue (trick for instant benefits).Two winters in a row I experimented. First year I used the swallow type pills vitamin C and was sick regularly. The following winter I tried these and had very little illness and when I did catch something, it was noticeably lighter and was over it quicker.I take one with breakfast and if my allergies are bothering me I will take one with dinner. I haven’t had a cold since covid begen but when i get one, I triple dose these and it goes away quickly. It is impossible to take too much C and if you do you just pee it out. Hope this helps someone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good taste
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because my subscribe-and-save Vitamin C product was always out of stock. So I found this Vitamin C with 150 count (3 months supply) to try it out. The tablet size is a bit bigger than the usual tablet (nickel size) but that's OK with me since it's chewable (which is my main requirement). The first initial taste was a bit sour but after a while I got used to the taste - much like a sour orange.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tastes good, has USP label.
reviews.reviewText: Several years ago I read in Consumer Reports about vitamin supplements, that there's little oversight in quality control, not being regulated by FDA, and it's Buyer Beware. They said there are however some testing labs that seem to have a good reputation for unbiased supplement evaluations, and as I recall, the USP label was one of them. So, other factors being equal, I tend to look for this label when I shop for supplements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I am very proud for buying 2 of this item (Vitamin c) it worth every pennies for me and for my family too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Health
reviews.reviewText: My family uses Vitamin C every day for good health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Chewable Vitamin
reviews.reviewText: A good vitamin that gets the job done. Very easy since it is chewable. The taste is good considering that there is very little sugar in it compared to other chewable vitamins I have had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is going to sound silly, but I save my Chewable Vitamin C tablet to after I have taken all my other medications and supplements. I don't like taking the others and the C tablet is like a treat because they are so yummy. I have to stop myself from the temptation of chewing up more than one. (Don't tell anyone, but sometimes I do chew two!)
